title: The Strange Affair of Uncle Harry (restored, with intro and outro commentary) (1945, film noir, imdb score: 6.8)

sources.title: The Strange Affair of Uncle Harry (restored, with intro and outro commentary) (1945, film noir, imdb score: 6.8)
sources.description: The Strange Affair of Uncle Harry , also known as Uncle Harry and The Zero Murder Case , is a 1945 American film noir directed by Robert Siodmak and starring George Sanders , Geraldine Fitzgerald and Ella Raines . It is based on the stage play Uncle Harry by Thomas Job, which was first performed in 1938.
